articles.title: Make Driving Great Again: President Trump Showcases American Auto Industry’s Revival in Michigan - The White House (.gov)
articles.description: President Donald J. Trump took office on a promise to revitalize the American auto industry — and after just one year, he has unquestionably delivered.
articles.content: President Donald J. Trump took office on a promise to revitalize the American auto industry and after just one year, he has unquestionably delivered. Today, as President Trump visits Michigan and tou… [+2427 chars]
